issue.title: [Java] Enable changing default logging level when running tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3111](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3111). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently tests use the logback logger which has a default level of DEBUG. We should provide a way to change this level so that tests can be run without seeing a ton of DEBUG logging messages, if needed.
